title: Can Illaoi and Braum be listed as friends?
body: They both have the same kind of tone to their voice, so I wouldn't be surprised to see them chugging away at a tavern, because they seem like the kind of people who would do that together.

replies.body: I envision those two in a tavern, arm-wrestling while using their free hands to down a gargantuan amount of ale across a period of days. Gragas as ref.

She seems a bit harsh.  Listening to some of her voice lines, she seems like if she saw, say, a child who had dropped their ice-cream, she would smack the kid upside the head and say something about "life is motion" that would somehow cheer the kid up.  If Braum saw that kid, he'd get them a new ice cream and some supportive advice.
They could probably get along, but she seems to fall back on violence far too easily to get along well with Braum.
Then again, Braum and {{champion:23}} are friends, so I suppose it could happen if they were to meet.
I think she'd instead smack the kid then say that there is so much more to life than a dropped ice-cream cone.

She's a more stern caretaker while Braum is more emotional. 

I'm shipping them now.

> Lorewise: No
> 
> She has never been in the Freljord, and she even "helped" a man of the Winter Claw, enemy of Ashe.

Help is a strong word.

But from the voiceover it looks like she almost has no explicit allegiance with any faction in Runeterra, except for her God. Seems like she prefers to "test" different people and teach them some kind of lesson. Since she talks about Gangplank and his fall from his seat of power, it feels like she tries to reach the inner potential of different people during her "teachings". She also states that Miss Fortune Betrayal waked Gangplank from his slumber (due to his power he wasn't living anymore his life to fullest i suppose). Only thing that bothers me is that her voiceover seems to suggest she's being traveling (or has traveled) through Runeterra, so it could be possible she isn't oblivious to other cultures like the Freljordians, but that is only my opinion for the moment.
